content: What time is the Connectathon Kick Off?
Hi Sandy, it is at 4pm PT on Wednesday
I just noticed. If you switch the 'Whova app' to show the app's times in your local time, it doesn't make that shift when you add it to a Google Calendar. If it's in PST, it works as intended
So, careful with that, especially since this is a global event!

@David Hay - note that the KO Session for the IPS Track is Scheduled for 10:00 US Pacific Time on Weds, which is 7:00am Thursday in NZ. Whova is our friend and I've had no issues with creating calendar entries in MS Outlook from agenda items displayed in local time.
Yep - noticed that. The 'convert to local timezone' is really handy...
Agreed. The timezone conversion is super useful!
